result.execSummary:
The defendant Peter J Shawanomitta was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Peter J Shawanomitta is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Peter J Shawanomitta was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Peter J Shawanomitta was found guilty of Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.
All financials same as noted above.

Huber / work release granted for any purpose the Law allows.
Credit for 25 days
Provide a DNA sample while in the jail for this case.

records.addlTxt: Court advises party of their rights, finds factual basis, accepts defendant's waiver of their rights, the plea made, and finds guilty.
Defendant Peter J Shawanomitta in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Defendant Peter J Shawanomitta in custody.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
for ARGN (06-15-15 at 1:30pm) - provided to the Def. in Court.

Defendant Peter J Shawanomitta in court with Attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Defendant Peter J Shawanomitta in custody.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Officer Jeffrey Buettner sworn & testfies. Witness identifies the Def. Cross exam by Atty. Haacke. Redirect by Atty. Niemi. Recross by Atty. Haacke. Witness excused. 
Det. Adam Hoffman sworn & testfies. Witness identifies the Def. Cross exam by Atty Haacke. Closing statements provided to the court - Court takes judicial notice of Shawano County Case 09CM1309. Atty. Niemi alerts the court that the state is waiting for a Cert. JOC from Waupaca County. That JOC is needed to assert the "repeater" modifier in this case. 
ARGN set for 06-15-15 at 1:30pm. Court will decide at that time if there is felony probable cause found in this matter.  Arraignment scheduled for June 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
No contact with victims directly or indirectly.  Absolute sobriety.  Picture and prints
Defendant Peter J Shawanomitta appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Catharine Denise White appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 2, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
